text: Wathi unyana (wakhe lowo) esakuba emdala ngokwaneleyo ukuba ahambe naye, wathi kuye: “O nyana wam! Ndibone ephupheni ndixhela wena (njengedini lomnikelo kuAllah). Bona wena ke ukuba ucinga ntoni na!” Wathi yena: “O tata! Yenza oko ukuyalelweyo, ukuba uAllâh Uyavuma uya kundifumana ndingonyamezelayo.”
